snippet: Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin on Thursday said Ukraine’s former prime minister, Yulia V. Tymoshenko, was welcome to receive medical treatment in Russia.
abstract: Prime Min Vladimir V Putin of Russia says that the jailed Ukrainian opposition figure Yulia V Tymoshenko is welcome to receive medical treatment in Russia; comments appear to be dig at Ukraine Pres Viktor F Yanukovich, who imprisoned her in a case widely condemned as politically motivated.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin on Thursday said Ukraine’s former prime minister, Yulia V. Tymoshenko, was welcome to receive medical treatment in Russia.

headline.seo: Russia: Ukraine Rejects Putin’s Offer For Yulia V. Tymoshenko
headline.main: Russia: Ukraine Rejects a Putin Offer
headline.print_headline: Russia: Ukraine Rejects a Putin Offer
